mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_SOURCEFLOWRUNID as "${columnPrefix}sourceFlowRunId", ${tableAlias}S_SOURCEFLOWID as "${columnPrefix}sourceFlowId", ${tableAlias}S_SOURCEFLOWTYPECODE as "${columnPrefix}sourceFlowTypeCode", ${tableAlias}S_TARGETFLOWRUNID as "${columnPrefix}targetFlowRunId", ${tableAlias}S_TARGETFLOWID as "${columnPrefix}targetFlowId", ${tableAlias}S_TARGETFLOWTYPECODE as "${columnPrefix}targetFlowTypeCode", ${tableAlias}S_DAYPLANID as "${columnPrefix}dayPlanId", ${tableAlias}S_TYPE as "${columnPrefix}type", ${tableAlias}D_SWITCHTIME as "${columnPrefix}switchTime", ${tableAlias}S_WORKERID as "${columnPrefix}workerId", ${tableAlias}S_WORKERNAME as "${columnPrefix}workerName", ${tableAlias}S_TRAINSETID as "${columnPrefix}trainsetId"
